original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged down in mid day trade, on profit taking and selling pressures, an analyst said.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.02 percent or 1.58 points to 9,179.64, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.03 percent or 0.84 points to 2,608.03.
Top losers; Sampath Bank, Nations Development Bank and DFCC Bank. (Colombo/June20/2023)
